entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:46 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 7:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -23.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -26.9°C
Wind: NW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Partly cloudy. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
